nodes.id: 国有重点大型企业监事会

zh-cn: 国有重点大型企业监事会

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国国务院已撤销的派出机构，是国务院向国有重点大型企业派出的监督机构。
description.en: A defunct dispatched agency of the State Council of the People's Republic of China, which was a supervisory body sent by the State Council to key state-owned large enterprises.

监事会工作局（国有企业监事会工作办公室）

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国公务员的一种行政级别。
description.en: An administrative rank for civil servants in the People's Republic of China.

nodes.id: 崔世安 (国企监事会主席)

zh-cn: 崔世安 (国企监事会主席)

relationships.source: 中华人民共和国国务院
relationships.target: 国有重点大型企业监事会

description.zh-cn: 2000年，根据中共十五届四中全会决议和修改后的《中华人民共和国公司法》，国务院通过了《国有企业监事会暂行条例》，决定向国有重点大型企业派出国有重点大型企业监事会。
description.en: In 2000, based on the resolution of the Fourth Plenary Session of the 15th CPC Central Committee and the revised Company Law of the PRC, the State Council passed the Interim Regulations on the Board of Supervisors of State-owned Enterprises and decided to dispatch the Supervisory Board for Key State-owned Large Enterprises to key state-owned large enterprises.

relationships.source: 国有企业监事会暂行条例
relationships.target: 国有重点大型企业监事会

description.zh-cn: 根据此条例，国务院决定向国有重点大型企业派出国有重点大型企业监事会。
description.en: According to these regulations, the State Council decided to dispatch the Supervisory Board for Key State-owned Large Enterprises to key state-owned large enterprises.

relationships.source: 国有重点大型企业监事会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国国务院

position.en: Dispatched agency of the State Council

description.zh-cn: 国有重点大型企业监事会是中华人民共和国国务院的派出机构。
description.en: The Supervisory Board for Key State-owned Large Enterprises was a dispatched agency of the State Council of the People's Republic of China.

relationships.source: 国有重点大型企业监事会
relationships.target: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会

description.zh-cn: 2003年国务院国资委组建后，国有重点大型企业监事会工作交由国务院国资委负责，纳入其监管体系。
description.en: After the establishment of SASAC in 2003, the work of the Supervisory Board for Key State-owned Large Enterprises was managed by SASAC and incorporated into its regulatory system.

relationships.source: 第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议
relationships.target: 国务院机构改革方案

description.zh-cn: 2018年3月17日，第十三届全国人民代表大会第一次会议通过了关于国务院机构改革方案的决定，批准了该方案。
description.en: On March 17, 2018, the First Session of the 13th National People's Congress passed the decision on the State Council's institutional reform plan, approving the plan.

relationships.target: 国有重点大型企业监事会

description.zh-cn: 该方案规定不再设立国有重点大型企业监事会。
description.en: The plan stipulated that the Supervisory Board for Key State-owned Large Enterprises would no longer be established.

relationships.source: 国有重点大型企业监事会
relationships.target: 中华人民共和国审计署

description.zh-cn: 国有重点大型企业监事会的职责划入审计署。
description.en: The responsibilities of the Supervisory Board for Key State-owned Large Enterprises were transferred to the National Audit Office.

relationships.target: 中共中央办公厅、国务院办公厅关于调整国务院国有资产监督管理委员会职责机构编制的通知

description.zh-cn: 中共中央办公厅与国务院办公厅共同印发了该通知。
description.en: The General Office of the CPC Central Committee and the General Office of the State Council jointly issued this notice.

relationships.target: 中共中央办公厅、国务院办公厅关于调整国务院国有资产监督管理委员会职责机构编制的通知

description.zh-cn: 国务院办公厅与中共中央办公厅共同印发了该通知。
description.en: The General Office of the State Council and the General Office of the CPC Central Committee jointly issued this notice.

relationships.source: 中共中央办公厅、国务院办公厅关于调整国务院国有资产监督管理委员会职责机构编制的通知
relationships.target: 国有重点大型企业监事会

description.zh-cn: 该通知决定不再设立国有重点大型企业监事会和国有重点大型企业监事会主席。
description.en: This notice decided to no longer establish the Supervisory Board for Key State-owned Large Enterprises and the position of its Chairman.

relationships.source: 中共中央办公厅、国务院办公厅关于调整国务院国有资产监督管理委员会职责机构编制的通知
relationships.target: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会监督一局（国有企业监事会工作办公室）

description.zh-cn: 该通知决定不再保留监督一局（国有企业监事会工作办公室）。
description.en: This notice decided to no longer retain the Supervision Bureau I (Office for the Work of the Board of Supervisors of State-owned Enterprises).

relationships.source: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会监督一局（国有企业监事会工作办公室）
relationships.target: 国务院国有资产监督管理委员会

relationships.source: 国有重点大型企业监事会
relationships.target: 副部级

description.zh-cn: 国有重点大型企业监事会的行政级别为副部级。
description.en: The administrative level of the Supervisory Board for Key State-owned Large Enterprises was vice-ministerial level.
